title: Magic Sound Kit
description: Magic Sound Kit 4 sound library 413 sounds
longDescription:
Magic Sound Kit 4 sound library 413 sounds



Magic Sound Kit is a versatile sound library designed for those who want to add magical effects to their projects. It features high-quality magic sounds perfect for games and other creative works. The library includes unique sound effects of five elements: earth, fire, ice, water, and electricity.

• Earth Magic: sounds of meteor, kick, throw, explosion, spike, shockwave, impact, hit and whoosh. Ideal for creating sensations of strength and power.

• Fire Magic: effects of cast, explosions, hold, impact, break, fire, hit, whoosh and fireballs. Perfect for showcasing destructive and fiery attacks.

• Ice Magic: cast, hit, throw, impact and whoosh. These sounds create an atmosphere of winter magic and cold.

• Water Magic: cast, hit, throw, impact and whoosh. Perfect for spells and manipulations involving water.

• Electricity Magic: cast, strike, hold. cast, impact, lighting, throw, hit, explosion and arrow.

The library is perfect for both professionals and enthusiasts looking to make their projects more engaging and atmospheric.
